title: Respond to a Negative Product Review
description: A customer left a 1-star review complaining about a product defect. An agent needs to respond publicly and resolve the issue.

tasks.description: Identify the negative review and the customer who wrote it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the review and the associated customer account.

tasks.description: Post a public reply to the review, apologizing for the issue and offering to make it right.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent posts a well-worded, empathetic public response.

tasks.description: Create a support ticket to proactively contact the customer via email and offer a replacement or refund.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a support ticket to resolve the underlying issue privately.
